thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com
thread.title: Jessica

author: Jessica
title: Jessica
text: So my expierence with intoxalock has not been great but not terrible, the person named I believed gage that helped my set up the account was not helpful. I was missing a form and I had to call another rep to help me out and get everything cleared up, the second person I called was very helpful but the first person was not, told me he'd call the next day notifying me what happened I never got a call which prompted me to call.
